name: GEORGE WASHINGTON: Cosmic Incarceration ~自由~
description:
George Washington has been incarcerated in intergalactic prison on a strange planet for exercising TOO MANY freedoms. Use your might to get back to the estate. >:^)

a - move left

d- move right

space - hippity hop/stop charging throw

left click - throw ball/charge throw/return to ball

aim with mouse.
